name: div
features: Gel-to-Shell® Technology: Converts from flexible to rigid protection within 30 minutes for a personalized fit.
Comprehensive Coverage: Extends protection from the elbow up through the triceps.
Double Strap Design: Two adjustable straps with iridescent pull tabs secure the guard firmly around the elbow.
Moisture-Wicking Comfort: Interior comfort lining manages moisture to keep you comfortable during play.
Size Options: Available in Small (ideal for arms <10 inches) and Large (arms >10 inches); measure around the bicep for proper sizing.
Official MLB Protection: Trusted by Major League Baseball players for reliable performance.
Durable Construction: Designed to withstand the demands of competitive play.
Easy Installation: Simple molding process ensures a secure and comfortable fit.
